name: Dinaglucan®
description: Dinaglucan® is a genuine beta glucan purified extract derived from specially selected yeast cell walls of Saccharomyces cerevisiae. It is a 100% natural product, with a high concentration of beta-1,3/1,6 yeast derived glucans, which are powerful immune-stimulants. DINAGLUCAN can be used as a pre-biotic. It is specially recommended for animals with diminished immune systems in order to reduce the incidence of contamination by pathogenic bacteria.
